des:
The Samsung ARTIK Cloud Smart Home Skill enables you to use your voice to interact with devices connected to ARTIK Cloud.

https://www.artik.cloud

For example, to control lights in your living room light, say "Alexa, turn on the living room lights"

To get started:
1.Create an account on ARTIK Cloud (FREE to start): https://www.artik.cloud
2. Add your devices (follow the instructions on the website)
3. In the Alexa app, go to "Smart Home", search for "Samsung ARTIK Cloud Smart Home Skill" and link your ARTIK Cloud account.
4. Say "Alexa, discover my devices" or in the Alexa app click on "Discover devices" button
5. After discovering your devices, they will appear in your device list in the Alexa app.
6.Then you can start interacting with your devices by voice.

For help with your Samsung ARTIK cloud account please see https://help.content.samsung.com/csweb/faq/searchFaq.do
